title: CLS Team Looking for Platinum 3+ Mid Laner For LCS-like Tournament
body:
Hello, The Mortals and we are looking for a Mid Laner that would be looking to tryout and looking for a team for the future.

Some things that you will need to know:
- This team is a LONG term commitment
- This team is a team where everyone will be putting in there all and there best efforts
- You will be expected to practice 4 - 5 weekdays and weekends (totaling 6 - 7 days a week)
- You will be expected to accept constructive criticism as well as output it
- We will be taking part in amateur series akin to the lcs but in an amateur scene
- We will be putting our best foot forward attempting to make a well organized experience

Our goals for this team include:
- As previously mentioned 6 - 7 days a week of practice (3 - 4 hours a day) and play in multiple amateur series/tournaments
- We will be looking to grow a strong bond between all five players and we will be looking to grow as a five man unit
- We want to be a strong unit that enjoys playing together and succeeds together
- Review our games and watch high elo games as a team whether it be lck vods or lcs
- We will have team talks at the end or beginning of the week to talk about meta picks etc

What I will need from you:
- Availability/Timezone
- Rank
- Top 5 Champions For Said Role
- Strengths
- Weaknesses
- What You Are Looking For In A Team
- Why You Want To Join This Team

**DO NOT ADD ME, I WILL ADD YOU**
